title: RIOT FIX YOUR GAME
body:
I've talked to multiple people about this problem and it is also happening to me
Every time i try to open League of legends Its shows with pvp.kernel has stopped working and i have to close the launcher and its really starting to get to me and my friends

replies.body:
Hey ItsKaneki,

I'd suggest you and your friends start by checking out the [Patching Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) support article.  It contains a few basic tips that often help with the kind of things you are describing.

Let me know how you go!

Cheers
Mindstar
